LUI $t0 0X1000
ADDI $t0 $t0 0x34

LUI $t1 0X00FF
SRL $v0 $t1 0X10

LUI $t2 0XFFFF
SRL $t2 $t2 0X10

JALR $ra $t0

SRL $v0 $v0 0X1F

JR $zero

SRL $v0 $v0 0X1F
SRL $v0 $v0 0X1F
SRL $v0 $v0 0X1F
SRL $v0 $v0 0X1F

SRL $v0 $v0 0X00
JR $ra
SRL $v0 $v0 0X00

should produce a a 255

00091402

000A5402
0100F809
00021002
00000008
000217C2
000217C2
000217C2
000217C2
00021002
03E00008
00021002

Y
